Description: Papyrus; Liturgy of Paaa; frame 2; Hieratic text in red and black recto and verso.
Curator's comments: See J. Assmann et al. Altaegyptische Totenliturgien II Totenliturgien und Totensprueche in Grabinschriften des Neuen Reiches (Heidelberg 2005), 152-3. To be published by J. Assmann and M. Bommas.
